name: mydoodle.com
tag_list: cards, wall-art, bespoke, online-design, retail, commission, sell-your-work
overview:
MyDoodle is a new and exciting online brand from leading TV shopping network Ideal Shopping Direct designed to bring the UK greetings cards & wall art markets to retail through personalised bespoke capability & broader large volume production.

Our site is based around a community of crafters, photographers and artists with an extraordinary array of talent, backed up by licensed content from some well known global brands. Users can sell their contributions through the website for a generous royalty fee.

With the highest quality outputs, a simple to use, professional looking platform & fast and impactful delivery, MyDoodle is changing the cards & wall art markets & setting new industry standards.
